formattedAddress: 359 E 105th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 359 E 105th St, New York, NY 10029-5005, USA

originalText.text: I go to this laundry because it's close to where I live .they changed the prices tho but I have a laundry card with money always on it.the employees r very nice.

text.text: I go to this laundry because it's close to where I live .they changed the prices tho but I have a laundry card with money always on it.the employees r very nice.

originalText.text: The lady who worked tonight was very unprofessional and disrespectful. They need to get rid of her or just shut the whole business down. Horrible experience. It’s not my fault that the workers are miserable with their jobs. The owner needs to find new employees. She even had the nerves to say us Americans expect to much. There was no reason for her to say that. She was the one who came up to me trying to rush me out of the laundromat when it was 8:00pm (which is the time for the last wash). She said the laundromat does not close at 10pm when online and on a written note on the door says it close at 10pm. I will be reporting this business. I think people just come here because it’s close to them. Other then that there is no other reason to come to this place. The workers are an embarrassment to this business and makes the business looks very bad. Do not come here. Even if it takes a little longer traveling to other laundromats, it is worth the effort traveling elsewhere.

originalText.text: I've been using this Laundry Mat,  for over 15 years. The customer service is horrible. The staff here are very rude and disrespectful to customers. Staff members do not speak English and often times conduct themselves unprofessionally. Very poor work ethics displayed by staff. The washers/dryers malfunction constantly and always seem to be out of service. The staff constantly rush customers so they can close before the time advertised. Shutters and doors are locked; usually at about 07:00 pm. When staff are told that the last wash is at 09:00 pm, they start to make up ridiculous stories and advise customers to either come back the next day or go somewhere else. Poor supervision on the part of the owner.

originalText.text:
Wash and dry your clothes. It’s as simple as that. If you’re looking for comfort(sitting down with your phone charging) , you might as well go somewhere else. The ladies are hardworking and amazing.
Price info - 2.75 for little machine27 minutes
5.25 for big. 34 minutes
And 25 cent to dry 12 minutes.

originalText.text: I have been coming here for 3 years now. It is cheap and easy to do your wash. HOWEVER, one particular woman who shuts down the mat on weekdays, ALWAYS closes and leaves an HOUR or MORE early!!!! Last wash is at 8:30p and the laundrymat closes at 10pm. This particular and very rude woman closes the DOORS at 8:30pm! This is total BULL! All the other employees stay open as long as they are supposed to, this woman is LAZY and rude, and the owner should know that he is losing money left and right by having an employee close an hour and a half early! Oh and if you leave your clothes to dry in the dryers, and you come back DURING business hours, this woman will LOCK YOU OUT before closing hours and you will have to come back the next day and get your stuff! TERRIBLE! We started taking our clothes to 116th. THIS PLACE SUCKS! Also, never EVER any toilet paper or soap in the restroom either.
